mn101:7.2: vedhanahetu → vedanāhetu (bj, pts1, mr), tibbā → tippā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn101:11.7: Evaṃvādī → evaṃvādīsu (mr), kañci → kiñci (bj, s1, pts1, mr)
mn101:12.1: Puna caparāhaṃ → puna ca parāhaṃ (pts1) | puna ca panāhaṃ (mr)
mn101:14.1: tasmiṃ samaye opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vediyetha → tiṭṭheyyeva tasmiṃ samaye … vedanā (s1-3, km, pts1)
mn101:23.5: yassa hi khvāssa → yassa kho hi panassa (si) | yassa hi khvassa (s1-3) | yassa khvāssa (pts1)
